summary: Adds brewers to all inns across Skyrim where you can brew your own mead!
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds brewers to all the inns across skyrim that allow you to brew your own mead. They are free to use, but you'll have to buy the ingredients! Recipes for each mead are as follows:
Honningbrew Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 nutmeg
Black Briar Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 blackcurrants
Black Briar Reserve = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 blackcurrants, 1 ginger
Ashfire Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 cinnamon
Nord Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 vanilla pod
Dragon's Breath Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 chilli powder
Juniper Mead = 1 water, 1 honey, 1 juniper berries
Note: Update 1.1 includes mead recipe books at all the inns.

This mod requires Dragonborn!!
NEW!! As requested there is now a version up that does not require Dragonborn to use :)

Compatibility: Not compatible with any mods that alter the layout of inns. Patches for popular inn mods may be available in the future if enough interest is shown.

Installation: Just install normally using NMM, or manually extract the esp and merge the meshes, textures and scripts folders with those in your data folder.

Updating: If you use the regular version, install BOTH the updates over version 1.0 (don't uninstall v1.0) and when asked if you want to overwrite any files choose 'yes'. If you use the non-DLC version, you only need to install update 1.2, and allow it to overwrite any files.

Credits go to egocarib and matthiaswagg for helping me with the scripts. Thanks guys! Also thanks to Tamira for helping me fix a problem with one of my meshes :)

Hope you enjoy this mod :)
author: simsim899

files.name: Real Mead Brewing Update
files.changelogHtml:
Added a brewer to The Retching Netch in Solstheim
Added mead recipe books to every inn
Added a brewer to the Ragged Flagon

files.changelogHtml: Updated the meshes and textures of the added ingredients so they now look MUCH better.
